data.name: DOA5LR Gust Mashup Swimwear Set
data.detailed_description:
This is a set of Gust collaboration swimwear for the characters of DOA5LR.
This set includes 17 costumes for 17 characters.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, Lisa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You need to own the relative character to use this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Prozessor: Core i7 870 over
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 2 GB RAM
  • Grafik: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Netzwerk: Breitband-Internetverbindung
  • Speicherplatz: 10 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Empfohlen:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows 7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Prozessor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM
  • Grafik: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Netzwerk: Breitband-Internetverbindung
  • Speicherplatz: 10 GB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: DirectX 9.0c over
